sentences.en: A double trapezoidal specimen will generate shear debonding.
sentences.cn: 双梯形的试样将产生切变脱胶现象.

sentences.en: A single specimen testing record is sufficient to evaluate.
sentences.cn: 单试件试验结果对计算是足够用的.

sentences.en: Collectors will pay $50,000 to $1 million for a rare specimen.
sentences.cn: 收藏家们会花5万到100万美元去购入一份稀有标本。

sentences.en: He is a fair specimen of manhood.
He refused to provide a specimen.
He was the most amazing specimen of the southern Negro I had ever met.
sentences.cn: 他是我所遇到的南部黑人中最令人惊异的怪人.

sentences.en: How is that for a specimen?
sentences.cn: 这例子举得 怎么样 ?

sentences.en: If your urine specimen shows the presence of bacteria, you'll be prescribed antibiotics.
sentences.cn: 如果你的尿样显示有细菌存在，医生会给你开抗生素。

sentences.en: One determines a directionally dependent property in a polycrystalline specimen.
sentences.cn: 用多晶样品来测量有方向性的特征.

sentences.en: The coating is sprayed onto the specimen, air - dried to a soft powder.
sentences.cn: 这种涂料喷涂到试件上去并在空气中干燥之后,即成为松软的粉末.

sentences.en: The Slovene bank has printed a specimen bank note.
sentences.cn: 斯洛文尼亚银行已经印刷了纸币票样。

sentences.en: The specimen deforms under a tensile stress applied parallel to the fibres.
sentences.cn: 试样在平行于纤维的张应力作用下发生变形.

sentences.en: They were thrilled to discover a perfectly preserved specimen of Roman pottery.
sentences.cn: 他们因发现了一件保存完好的罗马时代陶器而欣喜若狂.

sentences.en: Values were derived from the duplicate 12 X 3 - in . specimen compliances.
sentences.cn: 该值是由成对的12英寸X3英寸试样的柔度得来的.

sentences.en: What a poor specimen that child is!

phrases.tran_cn: 模式标本；标准样品；原始标本

trans.tran_cn: 样品，范例，（化验的）抽样，某种类型的人
trans.tran_en: a small amount or piece that is taken from something, so that it can be tested or examined
